    <item>
      <title>How rural churches can boost wifi connectivity</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/how-church-steeples-boost-wifi-connectivity-in-rural-communities-11255800</link>
      <description>Rural communities with little or no wireless internet are getting an unlikely boost from churches hosting satellite dishes.</description>
      <pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 23:52:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/how-church-steeples-boost-wifi-connectivity-in-rural-communities-11255800</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/2371802170109637507_4234028.jpg?20180217235206" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">The dishes are discreet on the spires</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/2371802170109637507_4234028.jpg?20180217235206" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/2371802170109637507_4234028.jpg?20180217235206"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Thirteen charged with US election interference</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/russian-troll-factory-charged-with-us-election-interference-11253471</link>
      <description>Charges have been filed against 13 employees of a Russian troll factory which is accused of attempting to interfere with the 2016 presidential election.</description>
      <pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 17:52:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/russian-troll-factory-charged-with-us-election-interference-11253471</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/12/70x70/skynews-us-congress-capitol-hill_4188155.jpg?20171220184254" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">The final vote to clear the tax bill took place in Congress on Wednesday</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/12/70x70/skynews-us-congress-capitol-hill_4188155.jpg?20171220184254" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/12/70x70/skynews-us-congress-capitol-hill_4188155.jpg?20171220184254"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Ireland enjoying strong technology investment</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/ireland-enjoying-strong-technology-investment-11254061</link>
      <description>Investment in Irish technology companies had its second strongest performance in more than a decade last year - as the presence of multi-national companies continues to transform the capital.</description>
      <pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 08:50:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/ireland-enjoying-strong-technology-investment-11254061</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-ibm-ireland-mulhuddart_4233368.jpg?20180217090828" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">A general view  of IBM Ireland&#39;s new European sales centre at its Technology Campus, Mulhuddart</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-ibm-ireland-mulhuddart_4233368.jpg?20180217090828" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-ibm-ireland-mulhuddart_4233368.jpg?20180217090828"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Uber in UK safety drive as it battles to secure future</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/uber-in-uk-safety-drive-amid-london-licence-fight-11252854</link>
      <description>Uber has moved to bolster its image through a series of measures to "enhance" passenger safety in the UK.</description>
      <pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 11:08:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/uber-in-uk-safety-drive-amid-london-licence-fight-11252854</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/09/70x70/7f601fa7ea3ce6cc01fafc26ce68ed3dda1fb1ae0672f2aedd93a27d1e8f84ae_4108325.jpg?20170923023554" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">A Nissan electric car at launch of the first Uber electric cars in London</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/09/70x70/7f601fa7ea3ce6cc01fafc26ce68ed3dda1fb1ae0672f2aedd93a27d1e8f84ae_4108325.jpg?20170923023554" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/09/70x70/7f601fa7ea3ce6cc01fafc26ce68ed3dda1fb1ae0672f2aedd93a27d1e8f84ae_4108325.jpg?20170923023554"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Major bug crashes iPhones and disables apps</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/apple-seeks-fix-for-bug-that-crashes-iphones-11252654</link>
      <description>Apple says it is working to fix a bug that can cause devices to crash.</description>
      <pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 08:43:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/apple-seeks-fix-for-bug-that-crashes-iphones-11252654</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/01/70x70/skynews-foxconn-iphone-china_4218227.jpg?20180130174538" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">Foxconn makes products such as iPhones</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/01/70x70/skynews-foxconn-iphone-china_4218227.jpg?20180130174538" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/01/70x70/skynews-foxconn-iphone-china_4218227.jpg?20180130174538"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Household items like perfume as bad as cars for pollution</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/household-items-like-perfume-as-bad-as-cars-for-pollution-scientists-say-11252527</link>
      <description>Chemicals in household products such as paint and perfume are now producing as much urban air pollution as motor vehicles, scientists have said.</description>
      <pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 06:21:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/household-items-like-perfume-as-bad-as-cars-for-pollution-scientists-say-11252527</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-istock-image-perfume_4232453.jpg?20180216064855" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">iStock image</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-istock-image-perfume_4232453.jpg?20180216064855" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-istock-image-perfume_4232453.jpg?20180216064855"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Petition to scrap Snapchat update hits one million</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/snapchat-urged-to-get-back-to-basics-as-petition-to-scrap-update-hits-one-million-11251614</link>
      <description>More than a million people have signed an online petition calling on Snapchat to undo a redesign to the app.</description>
      <pubDate>Thu, 15 Feb 2018 14:13:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/snapchat-urged-to-get-back-to-basics-as-petition-to-scrap-update-hits-one-million-11251614</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/01/70x70/2371801040072525107_4198287.jpg?20180104132535" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">Snapchat file pic</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/01/70x70/2371801040072525107_4198287.jpg?20180104132535" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/01/70x70/2371801040072525107_4198287.jpg?20180104132535"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Amazon Alexa ad 'triggered cat food order'</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/amazon-cleared-after-alexa-ad-triggers-cat-food-order-11249840</link>
      <description>Amazon has been cleared by the advertising watchdog after a television ad for its Echo Dot smart speaker activated a viewer's device and placed an order for cat food.</description>
      <pubDate>Wed, 14 Feb 2018 07:09:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/amazon-cleared-after-alexa-ad-triggers-cat-food-order-11249840</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-alexa-amazon_4230616.jpg?20180214071428" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">Amazon&#39;s smart speakers are always listening for the &#39;Alexa&#39; trigger</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-alexa-amazon_4230616.jpg?20180214071428" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-alexa-amazon_4230616.jpg?20180214071428"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Fury as Tesco takes payments months after people shopped</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/fury-as-tesco-takes-payments-months-after-people-shopped-11249970</link>
      <description>Tesco has apologised for taking money from people's accounts months after they visited its Express stores.</description>
      <pubDate>Wed, 14 Feb 2018 09:15:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/fury-as-tesco-takes-payments-months-after-people-shopped-11249970</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/12/70x70/skynews-tesco-turkey-gone-off_4192456.jpg?20171226184412" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">Tesco turkey </media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/12/70x70/skynews-tesco-turkey-gone-off_4192456.jpg?20171226184412" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/12/70x70/skynews-tesco-turkey-gone-off_4192456.jpg?20171226184412"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Magazine in novel bid to fight ad blockers</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/us-magazine-salon-in-novel-bid-to-fight-rise-of-ad-blockers-11250041</link>
      <description>Instead of displaying advertisements, a popular online magazine is planning on using its audience's "unused computing power" to mine cryptocurrency.</description>
      <pubDate>Wed, 14 Feb 2018 08:44:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/us-magazine-salon-in-novel-bid-to-fight-rise-of-ad-blockers-11250041</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-bitcoin-cryptocurrency_4230722.jpg?20180214094644" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">Online magazines turn to cryptocurrency mining to generate revenue</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-bitcoin-cryptocurrency_4230722.jpg?20180214094644" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-bitcoin-cryptocurrency_4230722.jpg?20180214094644"/>
    </item>
